displayProperties.name: Arm's Reach
displayProperties.description: In "Salvation's Edge," gain bonus Super energy when defeating a combatant near a limb of the Witness.

displayProperties.name: Persistent Resonance
displayProperties.description: In "Salvation's Edge," create orbs when depositing Resonance.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Necrotic
displayProperties.description: Melees cause damage over time.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Osmiomancy
displayProperties.description: Improves grenades.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Harmony
displayProperties.description: Weapon final blows grant Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Filaments
displayProperties.description: Empowering Rifts grant you Devour.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Stag
displayProperties.description: Rifts provides damage reduction.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Starfire
displayProperties.description: Empowered weapon damage recharges grenades.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Apotheosis
displayProperties.description: Gain melee and grenade regeneration after your Super ends.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Vesper
displayProperties.description: Rifts periodically release Arc shockwaves.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Swarm
displayProperties.description: Tangles spawn Threadlings.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Claw
displayProperties.description: Gain an additional melee charge.

displayProperties.name: Collective Purpose
displayProperties.description: Gain bonus range and handling when near allies. Bows receive faster draw time and Swords receive faster charge rate. The effect scales with the number of nearby allies.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Caliban
displayProperties.description: Powered melee final blows trigger an ignition.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Foetracer
displayProperties.description: Abilities grant bonus weapon damage.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Galanor
displayProperties.description: Super hits return Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Dragon
displayProperties.description: Using your class ability reloads and improves weapons.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Liar
displayProperties.description: Counterpunch deals extra damage.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Gyrfalcon
displayProperties.description: Gain volatile rounds after being invisible.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Cyrtarachne
displayProperties.description: Grenades grant Woven Mail.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Renewal
displayProperties.description: Improves Duskfield grenades.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Coyote
displayProperties.description: Gain an additional class ability charge.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Wormhusk
displayProperties.description: Dodging heals you.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Hoarfrost
displayProperties.description: Replace Barricade with a wall of Stasis crystals.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Severance
displayProperties.description: Powered melee final blows and finishers unleash explosions.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Abeyant
displayProperties.description: Improves Drengr's Lash.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Eternal Warrior
displayProperties.description: Gain bonus weapon damage when your Super ends.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Contact
displayProperties.description: Powered melee damage causes lightning strikes.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Bear
displayProperties.description: Improves Unbreakable.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Horn
displayProperties.description: Barricades unleash a Solar blast.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Scars
displayProperties.description: Weapon final blows heal allies.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Armamentarium
displayProperties.description: Gain an additional grenade charge.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Alpha Lupi
displayProperties.description: Casting Barricade heals you and nearby allies.

displayProperties.name: High-Tier Elimination
displayProperties.description: In "Salvation's Edge," gain bonus ability energy when defeating challenging combatants or higher.

displayProperties.name: Chaos Reshaped
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus damage while in combat for an extended time. Remaining in combat for even longer rewards a larger damage bonus and periodically heals the wielder.

displayProperties.name: Electrified Conductor
displayProperties.description: In "Salvation's Edge," receive a large amount of Special ammo when charging a conductor.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Synthoceps
displayProperties.description: Improves melee damage when you're surrounded.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Verity
displayProperties.description: Weapon final blows grant grenade damage.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Assassin
displayProperties.description: Finishers and powered melee final blows grant invisibility.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Inmost Light
displayProperties.description: Using an ability empowers the other two abilities.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Ophidian
displayProperties.description: Weapons ready very quickly.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Star-Eater
displayProperties.description: Orbs of Power overcharge your Super.

displayProperties.name: Stacked
displayProperties.description: In "Salvation's Edge," final blows have an increased chance of spawning Heavy ammo while in possession of Resonance.

displayProperties.name: Chaos Reshaped
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus damage while in combat for an extended time, activating faster. Remaining in combat for a slightly reduced duration rewards a larger damage bonus and periodically heals the wielder.
